translation: Foshuo shanyi jing one roll

source_sentence: 唐三藏法師義淨奉　制譯
translation: Translation of the Tripiṭaka Dharma Master Yijing Feng
Thus I've heard.
One time, the Blessed One was the Bhagavān.
He was staying at the Bamboo Grove in Rājagṛha.

source_sentence: 去斯不遠有一苾芻住溫泉側。
translation: Not far from there, there was a monk living near a hot spring.

source_sentence: 時有一天顏貌端嚴光明殊妙。
translation: One day, that monk had a beautiful face and an outstanding radiance.
After the first part of the night, he went to the monk's residence.
That god's majestic light was brilliant and complete.
It all shone brightly and universally from the hot spring.
He put his hands together in reverence and sat to one side.
He said to the bhikṣu, "Great virtuous one!
"Would you have heard of the Sutra of Good Night before?

source_sentence: 苾芻答曰我未曾聞如是經典。
translation: The monk answered, "I haven't heard of such a sutra.
Again, he asked the gods, "Did you know it before, sir?
The god said, "I don't know either.
The monk asked, "Who is there who knows it?

source_sentence: 天曰無上慈父在竹林園。
translation: The god said, "The unsurpassed loving father is in the Bamboo Grove.
Now, you can go there and ask about it.
Do as the Buddha tells you, and then you'll carry it out.
After he said that, he suddenly disappeared.
That monk then arrived at dawn in the sky.
He went to the Bhagavān and bowed his head with his feet at one side.
Standing at one side, he said, "Bhagavān!
"Last night, a god passed away after the first watch of the night.
He came to me.
His light shone brightly, and he surrounded a hot spring.
He asked me.
"Would you have heard of the Good Night Sutra before?
I said no.
I asked him, "Did he know it before that god Ren?
He replied that he didn't know.
I then asked him, "Who is there who knows?

source_sentence: 彼言無上慈父在竹林園。
translation: He said, "The unsurpassed loving father is in the Bamboo Grove.
You may go there and ask him.
Do as the Buddha says, and you will carry it out.
After he said that, he suddenly disappeared.

source_sentence: 我緣斯事故來至此請問世尊。
translation: This is the reason I came here to ask the Bhagavān about this incident.
The Buddha told the monk, "Do you know that god?
He answered, "No, I don't.

source_sentence: 汝今當知彼是三十三天勝妙天子威德大將名曰栴檀。
translation: Now, you should know that he's the Trāyastriṃśa Heaven's most sublime prince, the authoritative and powerful general named Sandalwood.
It's because he wants to benefit all sentient beings.
He's come to enlighten you by asking about the name of this sūtra.
That monk then again said to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 世尊我今願聞善夜經典。
translation: "Bhagavān, now is the time I want to hear about the Good Night Sutra.
Please have mercy on the Bhagavān and explain it for us!
It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the monk and said.
"This Sutra of Good Night has great merit.

source_sentence: 若有聞者能斷煩惱速證菩提。
translation: If anyone hears it, they'll be able to end affliction and quickly realize enlightenment.
You should listen closely and well and intently contemplate it.
I will explain it for you.
'Past dharmas shouldn't be recalled, and future dharmas shouldn't be sought after.'
'Future dharmas should not be sought after.'
Don't give rise to defiled attachment to present dharmas.
Such a practitioner is called truly liberated.
It was then that the Bhagavān spoke a verse, saying.

source_sentence: 過去不應念　　未來不希求
translation: "The past should not be recollected, and the future should not be sought after.

source_sentence: 於現在時中　　皆如法觀察
translation: to observe the Dharma correctly in the present time

source_sentence: 妄想心難遣　　智人應善觀
translation: deluded conceptualization is difficult to dispel. A wise person should observe it well.

source_sentence: 宜可速勤修　　焉知至明日
translation: It is advisable to apply oneself quickly to cultivation, knowing that there will be no tomorrow.

source_sentence: 由彼死王眾　　與汝鎮相隨
translation: because of this multitude of dead kings, you will be accompanied by them in your town

source_sentence: 是故我牟尼　　善夜經今說
translation: Therefore, I, Muni, will now explain the Good Night Sutra.

source_sentence: 常願諸有情　　離苦獲安樂
translation: always wishing that all sentient beings would be freed from suffering and attain well-being

source_sentence: 不造諸惡業　　恒修於眾善
translation: does not create evil activities and constantly cultivates goodness

source_sentence: 爾時世尊為欲利益一切眾生。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān wanted to benefit all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 令於長夜得安隱樂離諸障惱。
translation: For a long time, they'll attain peace and comfort and be free of hindrances and afflictions.
In the place of birth, they'll develop good roots.
They'll always encounter the Three Treasures and won't fall into bad destinies.'
He then further explained this dhāraṇī, saying.

source_sentence: 怛姪他　毘尼婆(引)喇儞　跋柁摩單滯　摩膩儞[打-丁+致][打-丁+致][打-丁+致][打-丁+致]　瞿里健陀里　旃茶里摩登祇(上)薩囉爛帝　莫呼剌膩攝鉢利　斫羯囉婆(引)枳　攝伐里莫訶攝伐里　步精揭(巨列)儞　儞弭儞名揭儞　訖栗多(引)儞　莎(引)訶(引)僧拽體(天移)曇(去)　頞[口*束*頁]伽帝　捺囉伽帝　謗蘇迦波(引)裔　劫布得(都洛)　迦波(引)裔　答布檀泥(去)莎訶若有苾芻苾芻尼鄔波索迦鄔波斯迦及餘善男子善女人等。
translation: 怛姪他　毘尼婆(引)喇儞　跋柁摩單滯　摩膩儞[打-丁+致][打-丁+致][打-丁+致][打-丁+致]　瞿里健陀里　旃茶里摩登祇(上)薩囉爛帝　莫呼剌膩攝鉢利　斫羯囉婆(引)枳　攝伐里莫訶攝伐里　步精揭(巨列)儞　儞弭儞名揭儞　訖栗多(引)儞　莎(引)訶(引)僧拽體(天移)曇(去)　頞[口*束*頁]伽帝　捺囉伽帝　謗蘇迦波(引)裔　劫布得(都洛)　迦波(引)裔　答布檀泥(去)莎訶若有苾芻苾芻尼鄔波索迦鄔波斯迦及餘善男子善女人等。
In this Sutra of Good Night.
Suppose there's a spell or a phrase in this Sutra of Good Night.
They read it, recite it, memorize it, make offerings, and respect it.
He clearly understands its meaning and explains it for others.

source_sentence: 當知是人於一切時無諸災厄。
translation: That person should know that at all times he'll be free of calamity and misfortune.
He'll be free of unjust and disagreeable behavior and afflictions.
He can know the events of the past seven lifetimes.
Nor does he forget the great mind of enlightenment.
He's certain to be able to enter the right path to nirvāṇa.
"If there are good men and good women.
He'll memorize and recite this Sutra of Good Night.
Where they'll be born in future lives.
He'll surely attain the knowledge of past lives.
They'll always be honored, peaceful, and happy.'
Again, he spoke a verse that said.

source_sentence: 此人一切時　　無有枉橫事
translation: 'At all times, this person does nothing wrong.'

source_sentence: 由造順時業　　永離非時死
translation: by creating karma in accordance with the time, one is forever freed from untimely death

source_sentence: 擁護諸眾生　　令離病憂怖
translation: to guard all sentient beings, causing freedom from illness and sorrow

source_sentence: 不祥及惡夢　　險路常安隱
translation: inauspicious and nightmarish dreams, and the path of danger is always peaceful

source_sentence: 若男子女人　　戴持此經者
translation: "If a man or woman wears this sūtra

source_sentence: 具相人敬重　　所願皆圓滿
translation: venerated by those who possess the characteristics, all vows are fulfilled

source_sentence: 若於身語意　　所有諸不善
translation: "If in body, speech, and thought there are any unwholesome...

source_sentence: 由此經威力　　終無有惡報
translation: based on the power of this sutra, there will be no more bad retribution

source_sentence: 若水火王賊　　雷電毒害等
translation: such as water, fire, thunder, lightning, poison, etc.

source_sentence: 怨家戰諍時　　念經皆得脫
translation: when there is a war between enemies, mindfulness of the scriptures liberates them all

source_sentence: 又復有明呪　　若能讀誦者
translation: "Furthermore, there is a bright mantra if one can recite it.

source_sentence: 於一切時中　　長善滅諸惡
translation: to cultivate goodness and extinguish evil during all times
He then spoke the mantra, saying.

source_sentence: 怛姪他　儞弭尼民達哩　窒哩盧迦(引)盧枳儞　窒哩輸攞陀唎儞　惡矩比　姪哩底奴麗　矩都軍底　矩都屈此　雞[口*栗]底矩比儞　擁護擁護我某甲於一切恐怖處　於一切疾病苦痛處　於一切憂愁相惱處於一切毒蟲毒藥處　於一切鬼魅厭禱處　於一切王賊水火處　於一切猛獸驚怖處　於一切謗讟言訟處　於一切怨家鬪諍處　於一切身意惡業處　所有語業四過處　於一切厄難危亡處　并執金剛神　常衛護我某甲并諸眷屬莎(引)訶(引)復說呪曰。
translation: 怛姪他　儞弭尼民達哩　窒哩盧迦(引)盧枳儞　窒哩輸攞陀唎儞　惡矩比　姪哩底奴麗　矩都軍底　矩都屈此　雞[口*栗]底矩比儞　擁護擁護我某甲於一切恐怖處　於一切疾病苦痛處　於一切憂愁相惱處於一切毒蟲毒藥處　於一切鬼魅厭禱處　於一切王賊水火處　於一切猛獸驚怖處　於一切謗讟言訟處　於一切怨家鬪諍處　於一切身意惡業處　所有語業四過處　於一切厄難危亡處　并執金剛神　常衛護我某甲并諸眷屬莎(引)訶(引)復說呪曰。

source_sentence: 恒姪他　呬里呬里弭里弭里　畢舍脂鉢拏　攝伐里止里莎訶爾時世尊說是經已。
translation: "After the Bhagavān taught this sutra to him, he said.
That monk and the others gathered there.

source_sentence: 人天八部諸鬼神等皆大歡喜信受奉行。
translation: All eight groups of humans, gods, and spirits rejoiced greatly and believed and approved.
The Buddha taught the Sutra of Good Night.
